name: vault-contracts
description: Foundry-based Ethereum smart contract project implementing a covered metavault with ERC-7540 asynchronous vault patterns.

scripts.deploy:dev: forge clean && forge script script/DeployLocalDev.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:fork: forge script script/DeployLocalMainnetFork.s.sol --broadcast --unlocked --sig prepareAssets --rpc-url "${FORGE_RPC_URL}" && forge script script/DeployLocalMainnetFork.s.sol --broadcast --unlocked --sig setupMetavaults --rpc-url "${FORGE_RPC_URL}"
scripts.local:setup-e2e-test: bun run deploy && bun run local:create-deposit-request && bun run local:settle-requests && bun run local:create-redemption-request && bun run local:create-deposit-request
scripts.deploy: forge clean && bun run deploy:fork && bun run snapshot:fork
